creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
text:
(Lenya 1.2.1 / SVN 04-10-28 - default publication)

initial situation:
> Current Version	 	Thu Oct 28 16:18:40 CEST 2004	System

after first editing session: (one form OR bxe):
> Current Version	 	Fri Oct 29 19:37:20 CEST 2004	lenya

after second edition session:
> Current Version	 	Fri Oct 29 19:38:54 CEST 2004	lenya
> Rollback to this version	View	Fri Oct 29 19:37:20 CEST 2004	lenya

-> it's not possible to go back to the initial state

> -> it's not possible to go back to the initial state

Ah, it's just a matter of taste not to see a rollback version after the (first)
editing. To get the initial version, I could recreate the document.
creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
